description: The School Principal of the 9th elementary school (her full name 丘田 知紗 = Okada Chisa is given only in the manga), and as such http://anidb.net/ch27090 [Hisakawa Megumi]`s superior (albeit both are close friends and she refers to her subordinate as "Megumi-chan" in private). Her task is to monitor the http://anidb.net/ch27105 [Anti-Alien operations] at her school; she receives orders from "the committee".
name: Kouchou-sensei
